verses.verse: And it shall come to pass <WH8085>, if thou shalt hearken diligently <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all his commandments <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, that Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> will set <WH5414> thee on high <WH5945> above all the nations <WH1471> of the earth <WH776>:
and all these blessings <WH1293> shall come <WH935> upon thee <WH5381>, and overtake thee <WH8085>, if thou shalt hearken unto the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>.
Blessed <WH1288> shalt thou be in the city <WH5892>, and blessed <WH1288> shalt thou be in the field <WH7704>.

Blessed <WH1288> shall be the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy beasts <WH929>, the increase <WH7698> of thy cattle <WH929>, and the young <WH6251> of thy flock <WH6629>.
Blessed <WH1288> shall be thy basket <WH2935> and thy kneading-trough <WH4863>.
Blessed <WH1288> shalt thou be when thou comest in <WH935>, and blessed <WH1288> shalt thou be when thou goest out <WH3318>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will cause <WH5414> thine enemies <WH341> that rise up <WH6965> against thee to be smitten <WH5062> before thee <WH6440>: they shall come out <WH3318> against thee one <WH259> way <WH1870>, and shall flee <WH5127> before <WH6440> thee seven <WH7651> ways <WH1870>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will command <WH6680> the blessing <WH1293> upon thee in thy barns <WH618>, and in all that thou puttest <WH4916> thy hand <WH3027> unto <WH1288>; and he will bless thee in the land <WH776> which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth thee <WH5414>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will establish <WH6965> thee for a holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> unto himself <WH7650>, as he hath sworn unto thee <WH8104>; if thou shalt keep the commandments <WH4687> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and walk <WH1980> in his ways <WH1870>.
And all the peoples <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> shall see <WH7200> that thou art called <WH7121> by the name <WH8034> of Jehovah <WH3068>; and they shall be afraid of thee <WH3372>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> will make thee plenteous <WH3498> for good <WH2896>, in the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, in the land <WH127> which Jehovah <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto thy fathers <WH1> to give thee <WH5414>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will open <WH6605> unto thee his good <WH2896> treasure <WH214> the heavens <WH8064>, to give <WH5414> the rain <WH4306> of thy land <WH776> in its season <WH6256>, and to bless <WH1288> all the work <WH4639> of thy hand <WH3027>: and thou shalt lend <WH3867> unto many <WH7227> nations <WH1471>, and thou shalt not borrow <WH3867>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> will make <WH5414> thee the head <WH7218>, and not the tail <WH2180>; and thou shalt be above only <WH4605>, and thou shalt not be beneath <WH4295>; if thou shalt hearken <WH8085> unto the commandments <WH4687> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, to observe <WH8104> and to do them <WH6213>,

and shalt not turn aside <WH5493> from any of the words <WH1697> which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117>, to the right hand <WH3225>, or to the left <WH8040>, to go <WH3212> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430> to serve them <WH5647>.

But it shall come to pass <WH8085>, if thou wilt not hearken unto the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all his commandments <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, that all these curses <WH7045> shall come <WH935> upon thee <WH5381>, and overtake thee.
Cursed <WH779> shalt thou be in the city <WH5892>, and cursed <WH779> shalt thou be in the field <WH7704>.
Cursed <WH779> shall be thy basket <WH2935> and thy kneading-trough <WH4863>.

Cursed <WH779> shall be the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, the increase <WH7698> of thy cattle <WH504>, and the young <WH6251> of thy flock <WH6629>.
Cursed <WH779> shalt thou be when thou comest in <WH935>, and cursed <WH779> shalt thou be when thou goest out <WH3318>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will send <WH7971> upon thee cursing <WH3994>, discomfiture <WH4103>, and rebuke <WH4045>, in all that thou puttest <WH4916> thy hand <WH3027> unto to do <WH6213>, until thou be destroyed <WH8045>, and until thou perish <WH6> quickly <WH4118>; because <WH6440> of the evil <WH7455> of thy doings <WH4611>, whereby thou hast forsaken me <WH5800>.
Jehovah <WH3068> will make the pestilence <WH1698> cleave <WH1692> unto thee <WH3615>, until he have consumed thee from off the land <WH127>, whither thou goest <WH935> in to possess it <WH3423>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will smite <WH5221> thee with consumption <WH7829>, and with fever <WH6920>, and with inflammation <WH1816>, and with fiery heat <WH2746>, and with the sword <WH2719>, and with blasting <WH7711>, and with mildew <WH3420>; and they shall pursue <WH7291> thee until thou perish <WH6>.
And thy heaven <WH8064> that is over thy head <WH7218> shall be brass <WH5178>, and the earth <WH776> that is under thee shall be iron <WH1270>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will make <WH5414> the rain <WH4306> of thy land <WH776> powder <WH80> and dust <WH6083>: from heaven <WH8064> shall it come down <WH3381> upon thee <WH8045>, until thou be destroyed.

Jehovah <WH3068> will cause <WH5414> thee to be smitten <WH5062> before <WH6440> thine enemies <WH341>; thou shalt go out <WH3318> one <WH259> way <WH1870> against them <WH5127>, and shalt flee seven <WH7651> ways <WH1870> before <WH6440> them <WH2189>: and thou shalt be tossed to and from among all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776>.

And thy dead body <WH5038> shall be food <WH3978> unto all birds <WH5775> of the heavens <WH8064>, and unto the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776>; and there shall be none to frighten them away <WH2729>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will smite <WH5221> thee with the boil <WH7822> of Egypt <WH4714>, and with the emerods <WH2914>, and with the scurvy <WH1618>, and with the itch <WH2775>, whereof thou canst <WH3201> not be healed <WH7495>.
Jehovah <WH3068> will smite <WH5221> thee with madness <WH7697>, and with blindness <WH5788>, and with astonishment <WH8541> of heart <WH3824>;

and thou shalt grope <WH4959> at noonday <WH6672>, as the blind <WH5787> gropeth <WH4959> in darkness <WH653>, and thou shalt not prosper <WH6743> in thy ways <WH1870>: and thou shalt be only oppressed <WH6231> and robbed <WH1497> alway <WH3117>, and there shall be none to save thee <WH3467>.

Thou shalt betroth <WH781> a wife <WH802>, and another <WH312> man <WH376> shall lie <WH7901> with her <WH1129>: thou shalt build a house <WH1004>, and thou shalt not dwell <WH3427> therein <WH5193>: thou shalt plant a vineyard <WH3754>, and shalt not use the fruit thereof <WH2490>.

Thine ox <WH7794> shall be slain <WH2873> before thine eyes <WH5869>, and thou shalt not eat <WH398> thereof <WH2543>: thine ass shall be violently taken away <WH1497> from before thy face <WH6440>, and shall not be restored <WH7725> to thee <WH6629>: thy sheep shall be given <WH5414> unto thine enemies <WH341>, and thou shalt have none to save thee <WH3467>.

Thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323> shall be given <WH5414> unto another <WH312> people <WH5971>; and thine eyes <WH5869> shall look <WH7200>, and fail <WH3616> with longing for them all the day <WH3117>: and there shall be nought in the power <WH410> of thy hand <WH3027>.

The fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, and all thy labors <WH3018>, shall a nation <WH5971> which thou knowest <WH3045> not eat up <WH398>; and thou shalt be only oppressed <WH6231> and crushed <WH7533> alway <WH3117>;
so that thou shalt be mad <WH7696> for the sight <WH4758> of thine eyes <WH5869> which thou shalt see <WH7200>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will smite <WH5221> thee in the knees <WH1290>, and in the legs <WH7785>, with a sore <WH7451> boil <WH7822>, whereof thou canst not <WH3201> be healed <WH7495>, from the sole <WH3709> of thy foot <WH7272> unto the crown of thy head <WH6936>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will bring <WH3212> thee <WH4428>, and thy king whom thou shalt set <WH6965> over thee <WH1471>, unto a nation that thou hast not known <WH3045>, thou nor thy fathers <WH1>; and there shalt thou serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, wood <WH6086> and stone <WH68>.
And thou shalt become an astonishment <WH8047>, a proverb <WH4912>, and a byword <WH8148>, among all the peoples <WH5971> whither Jehovah <WH3068> shall lead thee away <WH5090>.
Thou shalt carry <WH3318> much <WH7227> seed <WH2233> out <WH3318> into the field <WH7704>, and shalt gather <WH622> little <WH4592> in <WH622>; for the locust <WH697> shall consume it <WH2628>.

Thou shalt plant <WH5193> vineyards <WH3754> and dress <WH5647> them <WH8354>, but thou shalt neither drink of the wine <WH3196>, nor gather <WH103> the grapes <WH8438>; for the worm shall eat them <WH398>.
Thou shalt have olive-trees <WH2132> throughout all thy borders <WH1366>, but thou shalt not anoint <WH5480> thyself with the oil <WH8081>; for thine olive <WH2132> shall cast its fruit <WH5394>.
Thou shalt beget <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters <WH1323>, but they shall not be thine <WH3212>; for they shall go into captivity <WH7628>.
All thy trees <WH6086> and the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127> shall the locust <WH6767> possess <WH3423>.

The sojourner <WH1616> that is in the midst <WH7130> of thee shall mount up <WH5927> above thee higher <WH4605> and higher <WH4605>; and thou shalt come down <WH3381> lower <WH4295> and lower <WH4295>.
He shall lend <WH3867> to thee <WH3867>, and thou shalt not lend to him <WH7218>: he shall be the head, and thou shalt be the tail <WH2180>.

And all these curses <WH7045> shall come <WH935> upon thee <WH7291>, and shall pursue thee <WH5381>, and overtake thee <WH8045>, till thou be destroyed; because thou hearkenedst <WH8085> not unto the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to keep <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> which he commanded thee <WH6680>:
and they shall be upon thee for a sign <WH226> and for a wonder <WH4159>, and upon thy seed <WH2233> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.
Because thou servedst <WH5647> not Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> with joyfulness <WH8057>, and with gladness <WH2898> of heart <WH3824>, by reason of the abundance of all things <WH7230>;

therefore shalt thou serve <WH5647> thine enemies <WH341> that Jehovah <WH3068> shall send <WH7971> against thee <WH7458>, in hunger, and in thirst <WH6772>, and in nakedness <WH5903>, and in want <WH2640> of all things <WH5414>: and he shall put a yoke <WH5923> of iron <WH1270> upon thy neck <WH6677>, until he have destroyed thee <WH8045>.

Jehovah <WH3068> will bring <WH5375> a nation <WH1471> against thee from far <WH7350>, from the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>, as the eagle <WH5404> flieth <WH1675>; a nation <WH1471> whose tongue <WH3956> thou shalt not understand <WH8085>;
a nation <WH1471> of fierce <WH5794> countenance <WH6440>, that shall not regard <WH5375> the person <WH6440> of the old <WH2205>, nor show favor <WH2603> to the young <WH5288>,

and shall eat <WH398> the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, until thou be destroyed <WH8045>; that also shall not leave <WH7604> thee grain <WH1715>, new wine <WH8492>, or oil <WH3323>, the increase <WH7698> of thy cattle <WH504>, or the young <WH6251> of thy flock <WH6629>, until they have caused thee to perish <WH6>.

And they shall besiege <WH6887> thee in all thy gates <WH8179>, until thy high <WH1364> and fortified <WH1219> walls <WH2346> come down <WH3381>, wherein <WH2004> thou trustedst <WH982>, throughout all thy land <WH776>; and they shall besiege <WH6887> thee in all thy gates <WH8179> throughout all thy land <WH776>, which Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath given thee <WH5414>.

And thou shalt eat <WH398> the fruit <WH6529> of thine own body <WH990>, the flesh <WH1320> of thy sons <WH1121> and of thy daughters <WH1323>, whom Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> thee <WH4692>, in the siege and in the distress <WH4689> wherewith thine enemies <WH341> shall distress thee <WH6693>.

The man <WH376> that is tender <WH7390> among you <WH3966>, and very delicate <WH6028>, his eye <WH5869> shall be evil <WH3415> toward his brother <WH251>, and toward the wife <WH802> of his bosom <WH2436>, and toward the remnant <WH3499> of his children <WH1121> whom he hath remaining <WH3498>;

so that he will not give <WH5414> to any <WH259> of them of the flesh <WH1320> of his children <WH1121> whom he shall eat <WH398>, because he hath nothing left <WH7604> him <WH4692>, in the siege and in the distress <WH4689> wherewith thine enemy <WH341> shall distress <WH6693> thee in all thy gates <WH8179>.

The tender <WH7390> and delicate <WH6028> woman among you <WH5254>, who would not adventure to set <WH3322> the sole <WH3709> of her foot <WH7272> upon the ground <WH776> for delicateness <WH6026> and tenderness <WH7391>, her eye <WH5869> shall be evil <WH3415> toward the husband <WH376> of her bosom <WH2436>, and toward her son <WH1121>, and toward her daughter <WH1323>,

and toward her young one <WH7988> that cometh out <WH3318> from between her feet <WH7272>, and toward her children <WH1121> whom she shall bear <WH3205>; for she shall eat <WH398> them for want <WH2640> of all things secretly <WH5643>, in the siege <WH4692> and in the distress <WH6693> wherewith thine enemy <WH341> shall distress <WH6693> thee in thy gates <WH8179>.

If thou wilt not observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all the words <WH1697> of this law <WH8451> that are written <WH3789> in this book <WH5612>, that thou mayest fear <WH3372> this glorious <WH3513> and fearful <WH3372> name <WH8034>, JEHOVAH <WH3068> THY GOD <WH430>;

then Jehovah <WH3068> will make <WH6381> thy plagues <WH4347> wonderful <WH6381>, and the plagues <WH4347> of thy seed <WH2233>, even great <WH1419> plagues <WH4347>, and of long continuance <WH539>, and sore <WH7451> sicknesses <WH2483>, and of long continuance <WH539>.
And he will bring <WH7725> upon thee again all the diseases <WH4064> of Egypt <WH4714>, which thou wast afraid <WH3025> of <WH6440>; and they shall cleave unto thee <WH1692>.

Also every sickness <WH2483>, and every plague <WH4347>, which is not written <WH3789> in the book <WH5612> of this law <WH8451>, them will Jehovah <WH3068> bring <WH5927> upon thee <WH8045>, until thou be destroyed.

And ye shall be left <WH7604> few <WH4592> in number <WH4962>, whereas <WH834> ye were as the stars <WH3556> of heaven <WH8064> for multitude <WH7230>; because thou didst not hearken <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>.

And it shall come to pass <WH3068>, that, as Jehovah rejoiced <WH7797> over you to do you good <WH3190>, and to multiply <WH7235> you <WH3068>, so Jehovah will rejoice <WH7797> over you to cause you to perish <WH6>, and to destroy <WH6> you <WH5255>; and ye shall be plucked from off the land <WH127> whither thou goest <WH935> in to possess it <WH3423>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> will scatter <WH6327> thee among all peoples <WH5971>, from the one end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776> even unto the other <WH7097> end of the earth <WH5647>; and there thou shalt serve other <WH312> gods <WH430>, which thou hast not known <WH3045>, thou nor thy fathers <WH1>, even wood <WH6086> and stone <WH68>.

And among these <WH1992> nations <WH1471> shalt thou find no ease <WH7280>, and there shall be no rest <WH4494> for the sole <WH3709> of thy foot <WH7272>: but Jehovah <WH3068> will give <WH5414> thee there a trembling <WH7268> heart <WH3820>, and failing <WH3631> of eyes <WH5869>, and pining <WH1671> of soul <WH5315>;
and thy life <WH2416> shall hang <WH8511> in doubt before <WH5048> thee <WH6342>; and thou shalt fear night <WH3915> and day <WH3119>, and shalt have no assurance <WH539> of thy life <WH2416>.

In the morning <WH1242> thou shalt say <WH559>, Would it were <WH5414> even <WH6153>! and at even <WH6153> thou shalt say <WH559>, Would it were <WH5414> morning <WH1242>! for the fear <WH6343> of thy heart <WH3824> which thou shalt fear <WH6343>, and for the sight <WH4758> of thine eyes <WH4758> which thou shalt see <WH7200>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> will bring <WH7725> thee into Egypt <WH4714> again <WH7725> with ships <WH591>, by the way <WH1870> whereof I said <WH559> unto thee <WH7200>, Thou shalt see it no more again <WH3254>: and there ye shall sell <WH4376> yourselves unto your enemies <WH341> for bondmen <WH5650> and for bondwomen <WH8198>, and no man shall buy you <WH7069>.
